svgRoot: <svg width="400" height="200" style="position: relative; background-color: rgb(255,255,255);" > <defs>#svgStyle# #multiplyLayers#</defs> <g id="layer1">#pattern# #glyphPosition# <text class="body" x="20" y="#rand#">#sentence#</text></g></svg>
svgStyle: <style>@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Rubik:300,300i,500'); text { font-family:'Rubik',sans-serif; font-weight:300; fill:rgb(65,65,65); font-size:28px; display:block; max-width:100%; } .body{} .glyph{font-size: 60px;} tspan{background-color:rgb(255,255,255);} .overlay{background-blend-mode: multiply; opacity:.3;} </style>
shape: <rect x="#rand#" y="#rand#" width="30" height="30" stroke="rgb(65,65,65)" fill="transparent" stroke-width="5"/>
<rect x="#rand#" y="#rand#" width="#rand#" height="#rand#" stroke="#shapecolor#" fill="#rand#" fill-opacity="#rand#" stroke-width="#rand#"/>
<line x1="#rand#" x2="#rand#" y1="#rand#" y2="#rand#" stroke="rgb(65,65,65)" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round"/>
sentenceBackground: <rect x="18" y="#rand#" width="#rand#" height="30" fill="white" opacity=".4"/><rect x="18" y="#rand#" width="100%" height="30" fill="white" fill-opacity=".75"/>
multiplyLayers: <rect id="overlay" width="100%" height="100%" fill="rgb(255,255,255)" /><filter id="blend" x="0" y="0" width="100%" height="100%"><feImage xlink:href="#overlay" result="rectangle" /><feImage xlink:href="http://i.imgur.com/2LhcHBX.png" width="100%" height="100%" result="strawberry" /><feBlend mode="normal" in="rectangle" in2="strawberry" /> </filter>
